title: Business Process Coordinator
job_overview:
POSITION SUMMARY
The Business Process Coordinator researches, analyzes, and recommends improvements to an organization's business processes in order to improve overall organizational performance. This individual will also study operational and performance data to identify trends and opportunities for improvement. The Process Coordinator position is highly independent yet is responsible to all departments within our organization. You will need to deliver results in a fast-paced and ambiguous environment and be a specialist in both complex technical and business matters.

This position is 100% remote. 

ABOUT CARDONE VENTURES
Our mission is to help business owners achieve their personal, professional, and financial goals through the growth of their businesses. We work in dozens of verticals and provide strategic business guidance through courses, live events, partnerships, and investments. Our core values are the backbone of our business and guide our hiring process: we are inspirational, disciplined, accountable, transparent, aligned, and results-oriented. This company operates nationally and is growing by the day.

- Leverage technology to enable process efficiency, data analysis, and process capability
